title: Tuna kebabs with lime marinade
ingredients: ['500 g (1 lb 2 oz) tuna steak', 'For the marinade', '1 teaspoon finely chopped fresh coriander', 'Grated zest and juice of 2 limes', '4 teaspoons demerara sugar', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'Salt and black pepper', 'To garnish: lime wedges and fresh coriander leaves']
